text: avarellavarum allahuvinkalekk purappett vannirikkukayanâ€Œ. appealata durbalar ahankariccirunnavareat parayunnu: tirccayayum nannal ninnalute anuyayikalayirunnallea. akayal allahuvinre siksayil ninn alpamenkilum ninnal nannalil ninn olivakkittarumea? avar (ahankariccirunnavar) parayum: allahu nannale nervaliyilakkiyirunnenkil nannal ninnaleyum nervaliyilakkumayirunnu. nam'me sambandhiccetattealam nam ksamaket kaniccalum ksamiccalum oru pealeyakunnu. namukk yatearu raksamargavumilla
